page.title: 20Employment in Cockerham
page.content: With the advent of new methods and sophisticated machinery farming has ceased to provide much employment in this area. Most farming families manage to operate with little or no hired help.The use of machinery in place of horses was one of the factors contributing to the closure of the Smithy about 30 years ago.Crookhey Hall,set in splendid grounds,is now a School for boys with special needs.It provides employment for a Headmaster,5 teaching staff & 26 ancillary workers, some part time.The Old Rectory Rest Home has accomodation for 24 residents & has 8 full time & pt time employees. Joiner & Undertaker,Electrician & Builder,Garage operation are tradesmen in the area but they tend to be a 1 or 2 man business. Other people find employment in Lancaster,Garstang, Preston or Lancaster University.
